citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
At time of inspection, the indoor portion of the adult breeding stock sheltered facility had a build up of grime, molded dog
food and clumps of matted hair. Cleaning and sanitation is an important part of animal health and husbandry. The
licensee shall implement a proactive cleaning regimen to include sanitizing no less than every two weeks.
To be corrected by: 8.14.2024

citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
At time of inspection, mature and juvenile roaches were observed in the "second puppy house". The roaches were in the
food receptacles and in the washdown area below the elevated enclosures housing young puppies. Pests can carry
disease that can impact animal health and husbandry. The licensee shall implement an effective pest control program to
reduce the contamination.
To be corrected by: 8.16.2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Licensee.
n

narrative:
3.11(a) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
At time of inspection, the indoor portion of the adult breeding stock sheltered facility had a build up of grime, molded dog 
food and clumps of matted hair. Cleaning and sanitation is an important part of animal health and husbandry. The 
licensee shall implement a proactive cleaning regimen to include sanitizing no less than every two weeks. 
 
To be corrected by: 8.14.2024 
3.11(d) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
At time of inspection, mature and juvenile roaches were observed in the "second puppy house". The roaches were in the 
food receptacles and in the washdown area below the elevated enclosures housing young puppies. Pests can carry 
disease that can impact animal health and husbandry. The licensee shall implement an effective pest control program to 
reduce the contamination. 
 
To be corrected by: 8.16.2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Licensee. 
 
 n
